oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Buddy Mitchell interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Minser, Billy
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Horace “Buddy” Mitchell was a member of the 1st Air Cavalry, serving June 1969 to June 1970 in Vietnam. He was an artillery sergeant in the Fire Direction Center. He was interviewed October 9, 2019, by William Minser. Audio interview: http://bit.ly/vv-buddymitchell
